Sun.title: Solar System
Sun.description: The solar system consists of the sun and all celestial bodies that orbit around it.

My.title: About Me
description: Hello! I'm Luis Henrique, a Full-Stack developer passionate about creating digital solutions that are both elegant and efficient. With over 5 years of experience in the market, my focus is on transforming complex ideas into robust and intuitive web applications, using best development practices to ensure scalability and a flawless user experience.

My journey in technology didn't start with lines of code, but with the characteristic sound of a dial-up modem and the screen of an old tube computer. I vividly remember the first time I had access to a PC with Windows 98; it was a box full of mysteries and endless possibilities. I spent hours exploring Paint, organizing files into folders that led nowhere, and mainly trying to understand how that machine could create entire worlds inside a monitor. It was this childlike curiosity, this desire to unravel the 'magic' behind the screen, that planted the seed of my passion and guided me to the career I have today. That initial fascination never left me; it just evolved.

Projects.title: Projects
description: Technologies: typescript, docker, angular, nestjs, mysql, selenium
A book aggregator project that collects books from various sources and makes them available to the user in a single place.
Technologies: python, ruby, ollama, google translate
A project for translating RPGMAKER games that uses artificial intelligence to provide accurate and contextual translations.

Venus.title: Venus
Venus.description: Venus is the second planet from the sun and is similar in size to Earth.

Experiences.title: Experiences
description: Responsible for developing scalable web applications using Angular, NestJS, and Docker. Led agile teams and implemented innovative solutions for clients from various sectors.
Development of RESTful APIs in Node.js and Python, integration of relational and non-relational databases, and automation of internal processes using modern tools.

Earth.title: Earth
Earth.description: Earth is the third planet from the sun and the only one known to harbor life.
